Motion: THP a world without coalition politics (coalition politics)

TH, as the Chinese Communist Party, would focus its resources on providing welfare as opposed to investing in foreign policy projects (i.e. the military, the One Belt One Road Initiative, aid to foreign countries etc.) (Chinese Communist Party)
THBT racial minorities should form a unified social movement instead of campaigning under individual distinct movements (racial minorities)
THBT the US Federal Reserve should abandon quantitative easing as a policy option (US Federal Reserve)
THP a world in which social norms privilege introverts as opposed to extroverts (introverts)
THBT the protestors in Myanmar should choose to engage in violent protests as opposed to peaceful protests (Myanmar)
